column6: a teacher was found dead in Boeng Run village
column9: Battambang province.------The victim was named as Aun Chantha
column10: a mother of one and a primary school teacher in Samlot commune.------She was last seen alive at around 11 am when students left school.------Police are now investigating. ------POST NEWS------Update: Later sources confirmed that her motorcycle and phones were found close to the body.
